data.actual_result: Client moves around with no methodology and can sometimes push the client outside of the bounds of the embed (counterintuitive)
data.expected_result: Client window should move around if needed to maintain view of the edited embed
data.short_description: Having an embed from a bot be edited scrolls your client up/down randomly
data.steps_to_repro: - Make a bot send an embed - Send some gap space, 4-5 messages below the embed - Have the bot edit the embed with different text of varying number of lines (length) - Observe.
